类 TaskManager

java.lang.Object
com.shapeville.logic.TaskManager
public class TaskManager extends Object
Manages the sequence and logic flow of different tasks within the Shapeville application. Handles task loading, switching between task panels, and interaction with MainFrame and ScoreManager. Defines the master list of available tasks and the session sequence.

    Constructs a new TaskManager.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • TaskManager

      public TaskManager(MainFrame mainFrame, ScoreManager scoreManager)
      Constructs a new TaskManager. Initializes task lists and sets references to the main frame and score manager. Defines the master list of all available tasks.
      参数:
      mainFrame - The reference to the main application frame (MainFrame).
      scoreManager - The reference to the score manager (ScoreManager).

  • 方法详细资料

    • startFullSessionSequence

      public void startFullSessionSequence()
      Starts a new full session, resetting the score and beginning the task sequence defined by sessionTaskSequenceIds.

    • startSpecificTask

      public void startSpecificTask(String taskId)
      Starts a specific task identified by its ID, bypassing the default session sequence. Loads the corresponding UI panel and task logic.
      参数:
      taskId - The unique ID of the task to start.

    • currentTaskTypeCompleted

      public void currentTaskTypeCompleted(TaskLogic completedLogic)
      Called when a task type (a set of questions within a panel) is completed by the user. Increments the overall session progress and loads the next task in the sequence if applicable. If not in a sequence or the sequence ends, navigates back to the home screen.
      参数:
      completedLogic - The TaskLogic instance that was just completed.

    • currentTaskInterrupted

      public void currentTaskInterrupted()
      Handles the interruption of the current task (e.g., user navigates away). Resets the state of the current task panel and logic.

    • setTaskSequence

      public void setTaskSequence()
      Sets the task sequence for the session. This method can be customized to define a different order of tasks. Currently provides an empty implementation.

    • resetCurrentTask

      public void resetCurrentTask()
      Resets the current task state. This is an alias for currentTaskInterrupted(). Provided for compatibility with external calls.
